title: Adamant equipment

properties.name: description
properties.value: Adamant equipment are items made from adamantite metal. Adamant equipment is stronger than mithril equipment, but weaker than rune equipment. Adamant items are green-coloured. Adamant armour requires 30 Defence to wield, weapons require 30 Attack.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Adamant equipmentThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Adamant armour
A player with adamant armour equipped.

Adamant equipment are items made from adamantite metal. Adamant equipment is stronger than mithril equipment, but weaker than rune equipment. Adamant items are green-coloured. Adamant armour requires 30 Defence to wield, weapons require 30 Attack.

Contents

  • 1 Weapons
    • 1.1 One-handed melee weapons
    • 1.2 Two-handed melee weapons
    • 1.3 Ranged weapons and ammo
  • 2 Armour
  • 3 Other

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Adamant weapons require an Attack level of 30 to wield, except for the adamant cane, which requires 28.

Armour[edit | edit source]

Adamant armour is the third-highest quality armour in the standard spectrum of metal armours (bronze to dragon). Adamant armour requires 30 Defence to wear.

Other[edit | edit source]

Ornamental adamant armour, such as heraldic and trimmed, have the same bonuses as standard adamant armour. These can be obtained from the member's only Treasure Trails minigame. These armour sets are often worn by more wealthy players due to their looks and price.

Note: Other players cannot trim or bless armour. Players claiming to do so are scammers.
